entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SPMI with `JitNoInline=1` asserts in instrumentation code #74718
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get period from PeriodicTimer #74716
  • [API Proposal]: Add DateTime support overload for ToDateTime in PersianCalendar #74713
  • [NativeAOT] Revisit process/thread termination scenario #74711
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests crash on NativeAOT arm64 #74710
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
  • standard2.0 Type.IsAssignableFrom not work #74700
  • Helix test results are not getting uploaded for a lot of jobs #74699
  • Complete warnings for AOT unsafe interop #74697
    8.0.0
  • MarshalUsing does not work with generics #74694
  • incorrect computation of build parallelism #74691

Closed

  • Consider adding more tests for the Equals instance method for the various vector types #68710
    Future
  • a field evaluates to null but passes a null check! #74706
  • Don't native build for the app cause missing meta exception #74503
    Future
  • Default implementation of an interface to satisfy another interface it inherits from is malfunctioning #74703
  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 1: 'no such table: Movie' #74659
  • Tests being used at runtime are only correct for the first build #2879
    Future
  • ASP.NET location not found in ubuntu 22.04 when running dotnet watch #74688
  • .NET 6 vs .NET 7 reflection performance regression #74550
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 crashes on linux-x64 #70543
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fold field offsets into array addresses #74719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable KerberosExecutor on LinuxBionic, it doesn't have GSSAPI libraries #74709
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Vector documentation #74701
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move `src/tests/BuildWasmApps/*` to `src/mono/wasm` #74698
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • improve hanling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/7.0] For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74693
    area-System.Reflection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • [release/7.0] Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix #74690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] supporting `src/tests/run.sh` on LA64. #74470
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Non-canonical NaN tests for Vector Equals method (Issue #68710) #74517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74679
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `[NotNullIfNotNull]` to conversions from `string` to `JsonNode`. #74643
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't crash on recursive native layout #74630
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix #74673
    os-linux, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass over interop tests with NativeAOT #74627
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Pass /NOEXP /NOIMPLIB options to the linker when publishing native AOT .exes #74641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some erros when testing GCstress4. #74469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74674
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74675
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't crash compilation on invalid UnmanagedCallersOnly #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
